event.title: Richard Stallman gives a talk about "Free Software and education" in Marly-le-Roi, France

body.p: On June 27, Richard Stallman gives a talk about "Free Software and education" in Marly-le-Roi. The event will take place at the Cin√©ma le Fontenelle - Place de la gare, Marly-le-Roi from 10.00 to 12.00. Please, register in order to participate in the event.
